title: Character
description:
Jim Christy, Ray Christian and Tianna Kerg share stories about a character named Spaz, a hungry kid, and a scary street fight. 

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Nicola Cruz, Jim Christy, The Dead Poet's Society, Tianna Kerg, 10, 000 Maniacs, Kevin Allison, Ray Christian)
